items.title: Parliament's Public Accounts Committee likely to summon Sebi chief Buch
items.description: The PAC will probe the allegations against the Sebi chief and also ask her and other officials from the ministries of finance and corporate affairs to appear before the committee

items.title: Goldman Sachs downgrades SBI to 'Sell', slashes target price; share slips
items.description: The fall in SBI share price came after media reports said that the New York-based brokerage Goldman Sachs has downgraded SBI to 'Sell' from 'Neutral'.
